name: gutty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
brave and determined: The tennis player put on a gutty performance to take down her top-ranked opponent. Quitting her job was a gutty move when you consider that she didn't have a different job lined up. Synonym
gutsy
More examplesFewer examplesHe is a gutty player with a lot of determination and a lot of love for his teammates.Thanks to a gutty effort from their starting pitcher, the team won the playoff game. That has to be the guttiest pitching performance in the history of the game.
